install.name: System - Bible Study Podcast Publish
install.author: Tom Fuller
install.copyright: This component is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: When activated this plugin will publish each podcast to your site on a schedule you determine.

param.name: testing
param.label: Testing
param.description: Bible Study Podcast Publish creates a file in the media folder with today's date in it so that it knows to only run this script once a day. If Testing is set to Yes then the plugin will not create this file, consequentially forcing this script to run every time the page is reloaded. This is great if you're testing the script on a quiet server, but if you're on a busy server you'll bring it to it's knees, so use with care! Also note: If you set this to Yes you will have some output at the top of the page to keep you informed of what the plugin is doing.

param.name: xdays
param.label: Publish every x hours
param.description: Run Bible Study Podcast Publish every hour after the last run. (Enter 24 for once a day)

param.name: email
param.label: Send email notification
param.description: Select Yes to send an email when the podcast has been published.

param.name: recipient
param.label: To Email address
param.description: Email address to notify. Leave empty to send to the system default email address. Specify multiple addresses by separating them with a comma.
